Mediheal Teatree Trouble Square Pad

Brand: Mediheal

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: WATER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, METHYLPROPANEDIOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, MELA- LEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF WATER, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, SODIUM CITRATE, ALLANTOIN, OCTYLDODECETH-16, GLYCERIN, CITRIC ACID, DISODIUM EDTA, MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF OIL, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN,

LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, SODIUM CITRATE, ALLANTOIN, OCTYLDODECETH-16, GLYCERIN, CITRIC ACID, DISODIUM EDTA, MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF OIL, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF EXTRACT, MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) EXTRACT, MANGIFERA INDICA (MANGO) FRUIT EXTRACT
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
